amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike the $1.6 million earmark for The Boston Architectural College's Urban Sustainable Initiative.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 11 printed in Part C of House Report 111-209 to strike $1.6 million in funding for `The Boston Architectural College's Urban Sustainable Initiative' and reduce the overall cost of the bill by a commensurate amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A018) Failed by recorded vote: 111 - 316 (Roll no. 587).
